channel.name: DICOM Worklist

properties.select: SELECT orders.timestamp AS orders_timestamp, orders.patient_mrn AS orders_patient_mrn, orders.patient_name AS orders_patient_name, orders.modality AS orders_modality, orders.status AS orders_status, orders.his_order_id AS orders_his_order_id, orders.decipline AS orders_decipline, orders.ordered_by AS orders_ordered_by FROM orders WHERE status=2

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

channel.name: HIS Device RESTful

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: GlobalFunctions
RouteController

properties.script:
function UpperCase(input){ return input.toUpperCase(); }
function UpperCasePN(input){ var edited = input.replace(' ','^'); return edited.toUpperCase(); }
var data = JSON.parse(connectorMessage.getRawData()); var patient_mrn = data['patient_mrn']; var patient_name = data['patient_name']; var modality = data['modality']; var ordered_by = data['ordered_by']; var his_order_id = data['his_order_id']; var decipline = data['decipline'];
logger.info(his_order_id) logger.info(patient_name) logger.info(modality)
var text = "(0008,0050) SH "+UpperCase(his_order_id)+"
" + "(0008,0005) CS [ISO_IR 100]
" + "(0010,0010) PN "+UpperCasePN(patient_name)+"
" + "(0008,0060) CS "+UpperCase(modality)+"
" + "(0010,0020) LO "+UpperCase(patient_mrn)+"
" + '(0040,0100) SQ
\ (fffe,e000) -
\ (0008,0060) CS MR
\ (0032,1070) LO
\ (0040,0001) AE TT67
\ (0040,0002) DA 19960805
\ (0040,0003) TM 175609
\ (0040,0006) PN BROWN
\ (0040,0007) LO EXAM46
\ (0040,0009) SH SPD4548
\ (0040,0010) SH STN94594
\ (0040,0011) SH B58F56
\ (0040,0012) LO
\ (0040,0400) LT
\ (fffe,e00d) -
\ (fffe,e0dd) -
\ (0040,1001) SH RP4474
\ (0040,1003) SH LOW
'
FileUtil.write('/home/hafizh/worklist2018.dump', false, text);
logger.info("text:"+text); /* "(0008,0005) CS [ISO_IR 100]" +"
" + "(0010,0010) PN MOZART^WOLFGANG^AMADEUS" "(0010,0020) LO MWA484763" (0010,0030) DA 17911205 (0010,0040) CS M (0010,2000) LO ABZESS (0010,2110) LO BARIUMSULFAT (0020,000d) UI 1.2.276.0.7230010.3.2.110 (0032,1032) PN MILLER (0032,1060) LO EXAM8 (0040,0100) SQ (fffe,e000) - (0008,0060) CS MR (0032,1070) LO (0040,0001) AE TT67 (0040,0002) DA 19960805 (0040,0003) TM 175609 (0040,0006) PN BROWN (0040,0007) LO EXAM46 (0040,0009) SH SPD4548 (0040,0010) SH STN94594 (0040,0011) SH B58F56 (0040,0012) LO (0040,0400) LT (fffe,e00d) - (fffe,e0dd) - (0040,1001) SH RP4474 (0040,1003) SH LOW "*/
